short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the new tab page with a Catholic-themed layout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing a transformative Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience. Immerse yourself in a Catholic-themed environment, featuring prayers and dynamic background images that shift with the time of day. Seamlessly access daily readings and easily track the designated mystery of the rosary for each day, all within your new tab interface.
